name: combocard-game
description: ComboCard - Italian Card Game with Real-time Multiplayer

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix e2e install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm --prefix backend test -- --coverage && npm --prefix frontend test -- --coverage --watchAll=false
scripts.lint: npm --prefix backend run lint && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix && npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix
